arts.ttl: Plymouth 1-0 Liverpool: Player ratings as young Reds stunned in FA Cup upset
arts.sum: Sorinola, Nikola Katic and Maksym Talovierov combined for a series of excellent blocks, and Conor Hazard saved the day with two superb diving saves to deny Diogo Jota and Jarell Quansah in stoppage time to seal a famous win for the hosts. Hardie struck the post soon after as Plymouth searched for a second, while a stunning block from Matthew Sorinola denied Luis Diaz what looked like a tap-in down the other end as Liverpool began to grow increasingly concerned.

arts.ttl: Plymouth 1-0 Liverpool: 3 talking points as FA Cup rotation backfires on Arne Slot
arts.sum: Ryan Hardie's second-half penalty proved the difference, sealing a famous FA Cup upset for the Championship's bottom side. The forward line of Federico Chiesa, Diogo Jota and Luis Diaz fell shockingly short of expectations and managed very little which will have aided their quest for more minutes in Slot's A-team.

arts.ttl: Luke Littler brutally mocks Liverpool after their shock FA Cup defeat by Plymouth as avid Man United fan 'reels in the big fish'
arts.sum: Darts star Luke Littler mocked Liverpool following their shock FA Cup defeat by Plymouth. Arne Slot's side were beaten 1-0 by the Championship team at Home Park.

arts.ttl: Meet the Plymouth heroes who shocked Liverpool in the FA Cup: The wonderkid signed by Man City at 14, an ex-Red who once captained Steven Gerrard - and the manager forced to flee genocide as a child
arts.sum: AADAM PATEL: Plymouth caused a major upset on Sunday afternoon as they beat Liverpool 1-0 in the FA Cup fourth round.

arts.ttl: Jamie Carragher gives surprise reaction to Liverpool's shock FA Cup exit at the hands of Championship strugglers Plymouth
arts.sum: Jamie Carragher has provided a surprising reaction to Liverpool's shock FA Cup exit. The Premier League leaders were knocked out of the FA Cup by Plymouth.

arts.ttl: Plymouth show the magic of the cup is still well and truly alive, writes LEWIS STEELE - as boss Miron Muslic reveals his unusual celebration plans
arts.sum: LEWIS STEELE AT HOME PARK: Plymouth boss Miron Muslic urged the Argyle fans to enjoy a night on the tiles and turn the city green after the most famous win in the club's history.

arts.ttl: Plymouth boss Miron Muslic hails his history-making team after their shock FA Cup win over Liverpool but says staying in the Championship would be an even bigger achievement
arts.sum: LEWIS STEELE AT HOME PARK: The Championship's bottom club beat Arne Slot's heavily-rotated high-flyers on Sunday afternoon through Ryan Hardie's second-half penalty.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot gives injury update on Joe Gomez after Liverpool star limped off just eight minutes into shock FA Cup defeat by Plymouth Argyle
arts.sum: Liverpool manager Arne Slot has given fans an update on the status of Joe Gomez after the defendr had to be replaced just eight minutes into Sunday's shock FA Cup defeat to Plymouth Argyle.

arts.ttl: Harvey Elliott criticises Plymouth penalty award as Liverpool star takes swipe at referee
arts.sum: Plymouth secured a famous FA Cup win as they ousted Liverpool with a penalty, given against Harvey Elliott in the second half, leading to the game's winning goal

arts.ttl: 'Magical day' for Plymouth - vote for biggest FA Cup shock
arts.sum: Plymouth Argyle celebrate a "magical" FA Cup win over Liverpool - vote for your biggest shock in the competition.
